title: GE Jumps on Wabtec Deal, Workers Worry About AI, Sustainability Strategies
itunes:title: GE Jumps on Wabtec Deal, Workers Worry About AI, Sustainability Strategies
description:
Carol is joined by Bloomberg’s New York Bureau Chief Jason Kelly and they speak to Brendan Case, Bloomberg News Industrials Team Leader, and Joel Levington, Bloomberg Intelligence Senior Credit Analyst, on GE merging its locomotive business with Wabtec. Scott Lanman, Bloomberg News U.S. Economics Editor, discusses American worker's concerns that artificial intelligence would reduce jobs. Karina Funk, Head of Sustainable Investing at Brown Advisory, shares opportunities in environmental, social and governmental investments. And we Drive to the Close with Quincy Krosby, Chief Market Strategist at Prudential Financial.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
